##########################

This is the configuration file for node-pong.

ports: array of ports for node-pong listen to. If no port is informed, or no node-pong.json file is found, it will listen on the default port 13420.

serverMessage: should be a message that is shown on the console when the server is listening on the desired port, on the form of:

serverMessage: port
